attributes.action: Help Pubs by reducing tax on beer serrved from the pumps
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By reducing the duty this will help to reduce the cost in pubs and bars which in turn help the pub trade and keep the great british establisment going, to balance the cost of this the %age reduction from pubs and bars will be added to supermarket / shop chains where there is a significant pricing difference, pubs are shutting at a greater rate than ever before and need to be saved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
